abstract: Bank of America is exploring a potential sale of its foreign wealth management unit, after the business has failed to generate attractive returns, a person briefed on the matter said.
snippet: Bank of America is exploring a potential sale of its foreign wealth management unit, after the business has failed to generate attractive returns, a person briefed on the matter said.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America is exploring a potential sale of its foreign wealth management unit, after the business has failed to generate attractive returns, a person briefed on the matter told DealBook on Tuesday.

headline.main: Bank of America Said to Put Foreign Wealth Management Unit Up for Sale

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
